abstract: The Royal Bank of Scotland said Monday it has agreed to sell R.B.S. Factoring, a unit that provides loans secured against company invoices, to GE Capital, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: The Royal Bank of Scotland said Monday it has agreed to sell R.B.S. Factoring, a unit that provides loans secured against company invoices, to GE Capital, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: The Royal Bank of Scotland said Monday it had agreed to sell R.B.S. Factoring, a unit that provides loans secured against company invoices, to GE Capital, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: R.B.S. Sells German Unit to GE Capital
